MetaData.units: z-score from negative log10[GI50(molar)] data across NCI-60 for single drug and combo-score for paired drug
MetaData.platform: sulforhodamine B total protein cytotoxicity assay, 48hrs post-treatment

MetaData.units: z-score from microarray log2 intensity data across NCI-60
MetaData.platform: Affymetrix HG-U95, HG-U133, HG-U133 Plus 2.0; GeneChip Human Exon 1.0 ST array; Agilent Whole Human Genome Oligo Microarray
Affymetrix HG-U95, HG-U133, HG-U133 Plus 2.0; GeneChip Human Exon 1.0 ST array; Agilent Whole Human Genome Oligo Microarray

MetaData.units: average of beta values for gene-associated probes; 0 (no methylation), 1 (complete methylation)
MetaData.Comments: This approach looks at all CpG sites relevant for that gene and provides an average. A rule of thumb is that genes for which methylation is a regulator are shut down ~0.28 or higher. In those cases where methylation is not a regulator, say where there are only one or two CpGâ€™s things may vary.

MetaData.description: DNA mutation, summation of protein function affecting variant(s), by gene. Variant data is from the whole exome DNA sequencing in the NCI-60 done as described previously (Abaan et al, Cancer Res., 2013). As part of our normalization step, we have removed any variant that maps to more than one genomic location and any that occur in segmental duplications. Included are those variants defined as missense, nonsense, splice-sense, frameshift, read-through, non-frameshift insertions or deletions. Not included are variants found in more than 13 cell lines. In addition, variants must be absent from both the 1000 Genomes and ESP5400, and at least one  of the following conditions must be true: 1) if there is a sift score it must be less than or equal to 0.05; 2) if there is a polyphen score it must be greater than or equal to 0.85; or 3) the variant type must be defined as either a nonsense, splice-sense, or frameshift.
MetaData.Comments: For a visualization of how these results are calculated, see CellMiner / NCI-60 Analysis Tools / Cell line signatures / Genetic variant summation. Example: TP53. The CellMiner url is: https://discover.nci.nih.gov/cellminer.

MetaData.units: average log2 probe intensity ratio for the cell line (gene-specific chromosomal segment) DNA relative to normal DNA
MetaData.platform: Agilent Human Genome CGH Microarray 44A; Roche NimbleGen Systems H19 CGH 385K WG Tiling v2.0 array; Affymetrix GeneChip Human Mapping 500 k Array Set; Illumina Human Human1 Mv1_C Beadchip array
MetaData.Comments: Copy Number (N) can be calculated as N= 2 x 2^(intensity).

MetaData.platform: Agilent Technologies Human miRNA Microarray V2
MetaData.Comments: Averages for 52 cell lines are from duplicate arrays. Averages for 8 cell lines arrays are from quadruplicate arrays. These were BR:MCF7, CO:HCT116, CO:HT29, LE:K562, ME:SK_MEL_2, RE:CAKI_1,   LC:A549_ATCC and PR:PL_3.
